trans-unit.source: Defines methods for obtaining and releasing an existing handle to a Windows device context.
trans-unit.target: Define métodos para obtener y liberar un identificador existente de un contexto de dispositivo de Windows.

trans-unit.source: A device context defines the graphics object for drawing on a Windows-based device.
trans-unit.target: Un contexto de dispositivo define el objeto graphics para dibujar en un dispositivo basado en Windows.

trans-unit.source: An example of a class that implements the <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext> interface is the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Un ejemplo de una clase que implementa el <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext> interfaz es la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> clase.

trans-unit.source: Returns the handle to a Windows device context.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el identificador de un contexto de dispositivo de Windows.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> representing the handle of a device context.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> que representa el identificador de un contexto de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> are two methods that allow you to get and release the handle for a Windows-based device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> y <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> son dos métodos que permiten obtener y liberar el identificador de un dispositivo basado en Windows.

trans-unit.source: You should always follow a call to <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> with a call to <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> when you are finished with the Windows handle.
trans-unit.target: Siempre debe seguir una llamada a <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> con una llamada a <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> cuando haya terminado con el identificador de Windows.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> is not designed to obtain handles created using Windows GDI methods such as `CreateDC` or `CreateCompatibleDC`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> no está diseñado para obtener identificadores creados mediante métodos de GDI de Windows como `CreateDC` o `CreateCompatibleDC`.

trans-unit.source: Releases the handle of a Windows device context.
trans-unit.target: Libera el identificador de un contexto de dispositivo de Windows.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> are two methods that allow you to get and release the handle for a Windows-based device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> y <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> son dos métodos que permiten obtener y liberar el identificador de un dispositivo basado en Windows.

trans-unit.source: You should always follow a call to <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> with a call to <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> when you are finished with the Windows handle.
trans-unit.target: Siempre debe seguir una llamada a <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> con una llamada a <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> cuando haya terminado con el identificador de Windows.
